summary: San Antonio is a large city in Texas, with over 2.6 million people in its metropolitan area. It is known for its rich history, dating back to 1718 when it was founded as a Spanish mission. The city has many attractions, including the famous River Walk and the historic Alamo mission. San Antonio is also home to the NBA's San Antonio Spurs and hosts a major rodeo. It is an important military center and has a thriving economy, with several large companies based there. The city has a diverse population, with a majority of Hispanic residents.
title: San Antonio
